paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various mutations in the TTR gene associated with transthyretin amyloidosis, including their effects on protein aggregation and clinical significance.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy is caused by a number of TTR mutations, including L55P and V30M, which we examine here.

functional_data.summary: The L55P mutation destabilizes the TTR tetramer, leading to increased aggregation.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The L55P variant is one of the known mutations associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.
key_quotes: Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy is caused by a number of TTR mutations, including L55P and V30M.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy is caused by a number of TTR mutations, including L55P and V30M, which we examine here.

functional_data.summary: The V30M mutation destabilizes the TTR tetramer, leading to increased aggregation.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The V30M variant is one of the known mutations associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.
key_quotes: Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy is caused by a number of TTR mutations, including L55P and V30M.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The most common familial amyloidotic cardiomyopathy mutation, V122I, is carried by 3.9% of the African-American population.

functional_data.summary: The V122I mutation destabilizes the TTR tetramer, leading to increased aggregation.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The V122I variant is one of the known mutations associated with familial amyloidotic cardiomyopathy.
key_quotes: The most common familial amyloidotic cardiomyopathy mutation, V122I, is carried by 3.9% of the African-American population.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of TTR variants and their clinical significance

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant variants in the TTR gene were extracted successfully.
